data.description: If you are a student interested in starting and growing your career as a Software Development professional, Emerson has an outstanding opportunity for you! NI is now the Test & Measurement (T&M) Business Unit of Emerson, and we are seeking a dedicated and versatile Software Engineering Intern with an interest in cloud development to join our Platform Software R&D organization. Software Engineers find that our relaxed and stimulating work environment, which includes collaborating in small feature-focused teams, cultivates the type of engineering innovation that leads to our many award-winning products. We are looking for interns with a background or interests in cloud development, AI prompt engineering, Kubernetes, and Python development to help support the backend of our Nigel AI Advisor.
